HOME.INTRODUCING: Hello, I'm Esra, a frontend developer with a year's experience in web development. I have strong skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, along with expertise in responsive design frameworks like Bootstrap and Tailwind. I have hands-on experience in React and Next.js for building dynamic web apps, and use TypeScript for improved code reliability. Passionate and self-driven, I always strive to stay updated with the latest trends in my field.
CONTACT.INTRODUCING: Feel free to get in touch with me. I am always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas or opportunities to be part of your visions.
